entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 06:07 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: E 48 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
